alert.note: Alert for Uvalde; Zavala (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 11:19PM CDT until June 02 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN UVALDE AND NORTHWESTERN ZAVALA COUNTIES... At 1119 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Dabney, or 13 miles northwest of La Pryor, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... La Pryor, Batesville, Dabney, Blewett and Washer. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Austin San Antonio.
